Bioenergy_Justification: BP expanded in biogas and bioenergy, acquiring 100% of bp bioenergy, one of the top-three sugarcane bioethanol producers in Brazil.
CCUS_Justification: bp is investing with discipline in carbon capture, sanctioning four projects in 2024.
Hydrogen Fuel_Justification: bp is investing with discipline in hydrogen and sanctioning four projects in 2024.
